name: Planetfall (itch) (Floris0106, MerlinWizard, Zardous)
description:
In Planetfall you play as a spaceship rising from the surface. Your objective is to navigate your way between the planets and prevent your spaceship from falling into a planets collision cours. Pick up the fuel canisters to refuel your ship and achieve the highscore.

DISCLAIMER: Only the Windows version has exhaust particles, because WebGL does not support compute shaders.

CONTROLS:
Rotate Left and Right: [A/D]
Accelerate: [Spacebar]

DEVELOPER HIGHSCORES:
FLORIS: 659
MERLIJN: 535
MICAH: 515
